Desc.entry: Group occasionally meets to promote creative writing and publishing in English and South Asian languages. Readings and workshops are held on occasions like National Poetry Day and World Mother Language Day. Sahitya Press' most recent books are 'Raising their Voices: Poems by Children in Burngreave', 'A Slice of Sheffield', prose, poetry and artwork inspired by the subject of cutlery, and 'The Song of the Scythe', a picture book about Abbeydale Industrial Hamlet in 5 dual language editions.
